text: avareat avarute pravacakan parannu: tvalutinre rajadhikarattinulla teliv a petti ninnalute atutt vannettuka ennatan‌. atil ninnalute raksitavinkal ninnulla manahsantiyum musayuteyum harunreyum kutumbannal vitteccupeaya avasistannalumunt‌. malakkukal at vahicc keantuvarunnatan‌. ninnal visvasikalanenkil nis'sansayam ninnalkkatil mahattaya drstantamunt‌
